description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment (S96a) to planning permission Ref: 222947FUL dated 06.03.2023 for "Construction of a four storey residential building comprising eight self contained flats (four x 1 bedroom, three x 2 bedroom, one x 3-bedroom) over basement, ground, first and second floors with associated private amenity space, refuse, cycle storage and parking (following demolition of the existing building - with front facade retained only)". Amendment seeks to vary the description of development that was approved to construction of a four storey residential building comprising residential flats over basement, ground, first and second floors with associated private amenity space, refuse, cycle storage and parking (following demolition of the existing building - with front facade retained only)
